column5: I would recommend nestor falls fly-in have been treated great everytime. I just hope we get through the border this year with out a hassel.

I have crossed the 8 times since 9/11 and it has been easier every time. I don't think you would have any trouble crossing the boarder than last year. Nestor Falls Fly-In do a great job and I would also recommend them for a Fly-In trip.
